    .even3-menu-wrapper, .even3-menu-wrapper .d-flex {

    }

    .limiteImagemFundo {
      position: absolute;
      max-height: 900px;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      overflow: hidden;
      z-index: -1;
    }

    .full-width-image-banner.blur-background {
      filter: blur(30px);
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background-position: unset;
      background-repeat: unset;
      background-size: unset;
      transform: scale(1.2);
      max-height: 800px;
    }

    .imagem-capa-wrapper .imagem-capa {
      border-radius: 8px;

      background-position: center;
      background-size: cover;

      width: 1140px;

    .m-top-carousel {
      display: inline-block;
      width: 100%;
      margin-top: 75px;
    }

    .gallery-cell {
      height: 100%;
      width: 100%;
    }

    .scroll-categorias {
      display: flex;
      overflow-x: scroll;
      overflow-y: hidden;
    }

    .btn-categoria {
      white-space: nowrap;
      margin-right: 8px;
      background-color: transparent;

    }

    .flickity-prev-next-button:disabled {
      display: none;
    }

    .flickity-prev-next-button {
      width: 100px;
      border-radius: 0;
      background: rgb(255,255,255);
    }

      .flickity-prev-next-button .flickity-button-icon {
        background: rgb(255,255,255);

        border-radius: 100px;
        width: 30px;

      .flickity-prev-next-button.next {
        right: -24px;
        background: linear-gradient( 90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, rgba(251,251,251,0.9) 26%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%);
      }

      .flickity-prev-next-button.previous {
        left: -15px;
        background: linear-gradient( 270deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, rgba(251,251,251,0.9) 26%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%);
      }

    .lista-eventos .card-title {

    .container {

    .bannerEvento {

      .bannerEvento img {

    @media only screen and (max-width: 957px) {

    }

    .opacity-100 {

    .carousel-control-next, .carousel-control-prev {

<body ng-controller="EventosWhiteLabelCtrl">

  <div class="splash" ng-cloak>
  </div>

  
  <div class="position-absolute even3-menu-wrapper top-0 start-0">
    <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="d-flex flex-row justify-content-between align-items-center align-content-center">
          <div>
            <a class="navbar-brand" href="/">
                <img id="logoCliente" class="logo-cliente" alt="Eventos Unochapecó" src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/logos/Logo_Unochapeco_Branco.8ac4cf552ee849cd87d4.png">
            </a>
          </div>
          <div>
            <a class="btn btn-default btn-entrar" id="loginEven3" href="/login">Login</a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </nav>
  </div>

  
  <div class="limiteImagemFundo">
    <div id="imagemFundo"
         class="hero-image full-width-image-banner blur-background"
         style="background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 1%,rgba(0,0,0,0.4)60%,rgba(240,242,242,1)90%), url(https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/logos/BANNER_PAGINA_EVENTOS_1100x440px_01.8fe20a234ceb4b38a62f.png)">
    </div>
  </div>

  
  

  <div class="container imagem-capa-wrapper">
    <div id="myCarousel" class="carousel slide m-top-carousel" data-bs-ride="carousel" data-bs-interval="false">
      <div class="carousel-inner">
        <div class="carousel-item" ng-class="{active:!$index}" ng-repeat="item in cardCarrousel | orderBy: 'ordem'">
          <a ng-href="{{item.link}}" target="_blank">
          <img src="{{item.imagem}}" class="d-block w-100 imagem-capa" alt="{{item.titulo | translate}}">
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
        <div style="display:flex;" class="carousel-item" ng-show="cardCarrousel.length == 0">
          <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/empresas/capa-banner-empresas.svg" class="d-block w-100 imagem-capa">
        </div>
      <button class="carousel-control-prev margin-prev-next opacity-100" type="button" id="button-prev-whiteLabel" data-bs-target="#myCarousel" data-bs-slide="prev" ng-if="cardCarrousel.length > 1">
        <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/arrow-prev-slide.png" />
      </button>
      <button class="carousel-control-next margin-prev-next opacity-100" type="button" id="button-next-whiteLabel" data-bs-target="#myCarousel" data-bs-slide="next" ng-if="cardCarrousel.length > 1">
        <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/arrow-next-slide.png" />
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <div class="container detalha-evento mb-5" style="margin-top: 24px;">
    <div class="card shadow">
      <div class="card-body p-4">
        <div class="row mb-3">
          <div class="col-md-12">
            <div class="carousel-categoria">
                <style>
                     .categoria-197 {
                       color: #44b027;
                       border: 1px solid #44b027;
                     }
                     .categoria-197:hover, .categoria-197-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #44b027;
                       background-color: #44b027;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-197:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-197"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(197, 'Cursos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[197] ? 'categoria-197-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Cursos
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-198 {
                       color: #00BCD4;
                       border: 1px solid #00BCD4;
                     }
                     .categoria-198:hover, .categoria-198-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #00BCD4;
                       background-color: #00BCD4;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-198:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-198"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(198, 'Eventos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[198] ? 'categoria-198-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Eventos
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-199 {
                       color: #2ABB9B;
                       border: 1px solid #2ABB9B;
                     }
                     .categoria-199:hover, .categoria-199-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #2ABB9B;
                       background-color: #2ABB9B;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-199:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-199"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(199, 'Semanas Acadêmicas')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[199] ? 'categoria-199-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Semanas Acadêmicas
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-1250 {
                       color: #d6cf00;
                       border: 1px solid #d6cf00;
                     }
                     .categoria-1250:hover, .categoria-1250-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #d6cf00;
                       background-color: #d6cf00;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-1250:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-1250"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(1250, 'Viagens de Estudos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[1250] ? 'categoria-1250-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Viagens de Estudos
                  </button>
                </div>
              <script>
                var elem = document.querySelector('.carousel-categoria');
                var flkty = new Flickity(elem, {
                  freeScroll: true,
                  groupCells: true,
                  pageDots: false,
                  cellAlign: 'left',
                  contain: true,
                  draggable: true
                });

                window.addEventListener("load", function () {
                  flkty.resize();
                });
              </script>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row g-1 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-sm-between">
          <div class="col-lg-6 py-1 d-flex">
            <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="filtro.filtroCampoTexto" placeholder="Pesquisar eventos por nome" style="height: 40px; border-radius: 3px 0px 0px 3px; width:80%">
            <button class="btn btn-primary btn-block"
                    style="height: 40px; border-radius: 0px 3px 3px 0px; word-break: break-all; border-color: #042345; background: #042345"
                    ng-click="filtrarBusca()"
                    btn-loading="{{carregando}}"
                    data-loading-text="Buscando..." loading>
              <i class="fa fa-search fa-fw"></i>
              Buscar
            </button>
          </div>
          <div ng-show="viewModel.listaContratoCliente.length == 0" class="col-lg-2 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectUnidade"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.cidade"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options="option.denominacao for option in viewModel.locais | orderBy:'denominacao'"
                    ng-change="filtrarBusca(filtro)">
              <option value="">Local</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          <div ng-show="viewModel.listaContratoCliente.length > 0" class="col-lg-2 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectTipoEvento"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.unidade"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options=" option.id as  option.titulo for option in viewModel.listaContratoCliente | orderBy:'titulo'" ng-change="filtrarBusca()">
              <option value="">Unidade</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectAnoEvento"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.ano"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options="option for option in viewModel.anos" ng-change="filtrarBusca()">
              <option value="">Ano</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <div class="form-check form-check-inline">
              <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="inlineCheckbox1" value="option1" ng-change="filtrarBusca()" ng-model="checkOnline">
              <label class="form-check-label" for="inlineCheckbox1">Online</label>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <div class="form-check form-check-inline">
              <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="inlineCheckbox2" value="option2" ng-change="filtrarBusca()" ng-model="checkPresencial">
              <label class="form-check-label" for="inlineCheckbox2">Presencial</label>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <content ng-cloak>
    <div class="container lista-eventos">
      <div ng-if="!filtroAtivo">
        <div class="row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-3 row-cols-lg-4">
          <div class="col mb-4 pb-3 listItem" ng-repeat="item in listaEventos | filter: (checkOnline || checkPresencial ? filtrarOnlinePresencial : '') track by $index">
            <div class="card shadow-sm card-click h-100">
              <div class="bannerEvento">
                <img class="card-img-top" ng-if="item.urlImagemInterna != null && item.urlImagemInterna != ''" ng-src="{{item.urlImagemInterna}}" alt="{{item.titulo}}" width="200">
                <img class="card-img-top" ng-if="item.urlImagemInterna == null || item.urlImagemInterna == ''" src="https://even3.azureedge.net/idvisual/logos/png/even3.png" width="200">
              </div>
              <div class="card-body border-top mb-1 pb-0">
                <span class="badge badge-primary mb-1" ng-style="pegarCor(item.cor)">{{item.categoria}}</span>
                
                
                <h5 class="card-title max-3-lines font-weight-bold mb-0 pb-0" ng-class="item.categoria ? '' : 'mt-4'">
                  {{ item.titulo | limitTo: 70 }}{{item.titulo.length > 60 ? '...' : ''}}
                </h5>
              </div>
              <div class="card-footer border-0 mt-0 bg-transparent text-secondary">
                <p class="m-0 card-text">
                  <i class="far fa-calendar-day" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                  {{item.data | date:fullDate}}
                </p>
                <div ng-if="item.eventoOnline"><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> Evento online</p></div>
                <div ng-if="!item.eventoOnline && item.localRealizacao != ' ' "><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> {{item.localRealizacao}} </p></div>
                <div ng-if="!item.eventoOnline && item.localRealizacao == ' ' "><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> {{item.cidade}} </p></div>

                
              </div>
              <a class="stretched-link" target="_blank" href="{{item.urlCliente}}{{item.url}}"></a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      

    </div>

  </content>

</body>

</html>

  <script>
    var viewModel = {listaEventos:[{data:"2024-03-19T00:00:00",dataFim:"2024-12-17T00:00:00",id:440789,idCategoria:198,idContratoCliente:440,eventoOnline:true,passou:false,titulo:"Seminário Permanente de Metodologias de Pesquisa 2024",url:"sem_permanente2024",urlImagemInterna:"https://images.even3.com/9RvpU7vJs_NQmov9X0LgaavzEVc=/1100x440/smart/even3.blob.core.windows.net/banner/BANNER_UNOCHAPECO.ce701d560d7746c4bbe4.png",cidade:null,estado:null,dataInicioInscricao:"13/03/2024",cor:"#00BCD4",urlCliente:"https://eventos.unochapeco.edu.br/",localRealizacao:"Este é um evento online",resumoEvento:"A pesquisa se constitui num esforço metódico de busca de informações para produzir novos conhecimentos, ampliar a compreensão do mundo e auxiliar na solução dos problemas concretos que as pessoas enfrentam e a educação pelo fazer científico permite formar comportamentos indagadores, investigativos, que se pautam pela busca de respostas, que não se contentam com o estabelecido, mas o estranham e refletem sobre ele.       <div class="carousel-inner">
        <div class="carousel-item" ng-class="{active:!$index}" ng-repeat="item in cardCarrousel | orderBy: 'ordem'">
          <a ng-href="{{item.link}}" target="_blank">
          <img src="{{item.imagem}}" class="d-block w-100 imagem-capa" alt="{{item.titulo | translate}}">
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
        <div style="display:flex;" class="carousel-item" ng-show="cardCarrousel.length == 0">
          <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/empresas/capa-banner-empresas.svg" class="d-block w-100 imagem-capa">
        </div>
      <button class="carousel-control-prev margin-prev-next opacity-100" type="button" id="button-prev-whiteLabel" data-bs-target="#myCarousel" data-bs-slide="prev" ng-if="cardCarrousel.length > 1">
        <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/arrow-prev-slide.png" />
      </button>
      <button class="carousel-control-next margin-prev-next opacity-100" type="button" id="button-next-whiteLabel" data-bs-target="#myCarousel" data-bs-slide="next" ng-if="cardCarrousel.length > 1">
        <img src="https://even3.blob.core.windows.net/assets/arrow-next-slide.png" />
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <div class="container detalha-evento mb-5" style="margin-top: 24px;">
    <div class="card shadow">
      <div class="card-body p-4">
        <div class="row mb-3">
          <div class="col-md-12">
            <div class="carousel-categoria">
                <style>
                     .categoria-197 {
                       color: #44b027;
                       border: 1px solid #44b027;
                     }
                     .categoria-197:hover, .categoria-197-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #44b027;
                       background-color: #44b027;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-197:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-197"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(197, 'Cursos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[197] ? 'categoria-197-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Cursos
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-198 {
                       color: #00BCD4;
                       border: 1px solid #00BCD4;
                     }
                     .categoria-198:hover, .categoria-198-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #00BCD4;
                       background-color: #00BCD4;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-198:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-198"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(198, 'Eventos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[198] ? 'categoria-198-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Eventos
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-199 {
                       color: #2ABB9B;
                       border: 1px solid #2ABB9B;
                     }
                     .categoria-199:hover, .categoria-199-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #2ABB9B;
                       background-color: #2ABB9B;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-199:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-199"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(199, 'Semanas Acadêmicas')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[199] ? 'categoria-199-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Semanas Acadêmicas
                  </button>
                </div>
                <style>
                     .categoria-1250 {
                       color: #d6cf00;
                       border: 1px solid #d6cf00;
                     }
                     .categoria-1250:hover, .categoria-1250-ativo {
                       color: white;
                       border: 1px solid #d6cf00;
                       background-color: #d6cf00;
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                     .categoria-1250:focus{
                       box-shadow:none;
                     }
                </style>
                <div class="carousel-cell">
                  <button class="btn btn-novo btn-categoria categoria-1250"
                          ng-click="mostraCategoria(1250, 'Viagens de Estudos')"
                          ng-class="categoriaAtiva[1250] ? 'categoria-1250-ativo' : 'not-active'">
                    Viagens de Estudos
                  </button>
                </div>
              <script>
                var elem = document.querySelector('.carousel-categoria');
                var flkty = new Flickity(elem, {
                  freeScroll: true,
                  groupCells: true,
                  pageDots: false,
                  cellAlign: 'left',
                  contain: true,
                  draggable: true
                });

                window.addEventListener("load", function () {
                  flkty.resize();
                });
              </script>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row g-1 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-sm-between">
          <div class="col-lg-6 py-1 d-flex">
            <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="filtro.filtroCampoTexto" placeholder="Pesquisar eventos por nome" style="height: 40px; border-radius: 3px 0px 0px 3px; width:80%">
            <button class="btn btn-primary btn-block"
                    style="height: 40px; border-radius: 0px 3px 3px 0px; word-break: break-all; border-color: #042345; background: #042345"
                    ng-click="filtrarBusca()"
                    btn-loading="{{carregando}}"
                    data-loading-text="Buscando..." loading>
              <i class="fa fa-search fa-fw"></i>
              Buscar
            </button>
          </div>
          <div ng-show="viewModel.listaContratoCliente.length == 0" class="col-lg-2 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectUnidade"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.cidade"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options="option.denominacao for option in viewModel.locais | orderBy:'denominacao'"
                    ng-change="filtrarBusca(filtro)">
              <option value="">Local</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          <div ng-show="viewModel.listaContratoCliente.length > 0" class="col-lg-2 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectTipoEvento"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.unidade"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options=" option.id as  option.titulo for option in viewModel.listaContratoCliente | orderBy:'titulo'" ng-change="filtrarBusca()">
              <option value="">Unidade</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <select name="selectAnoEvento"
                    class="form-select"
                    ng-model="filtro.ano"
                    style="height:40px;"
                    ng-options="option for option in viewModel.anos" ng-change="filtrarBusca()">
              <option value="">Ano</option>
            </select>
          </div>
          
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <div class="form-check form-check-inline">
              <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="inlineCheckbox1" value="option1" ng-change="filtrarBusca()" ng-model="checkOnline">
              <label class="form-check-label" for="inlineCheckbox1">Online</label>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-lg-1 py-1 d-table">
            <div class="form-check form-check-inline">
              <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="inlineCheckbox2" value="option2" ng-change="filtrarBusca()" ng-model="checkPresencial">
              <label class="form-check-label" for="inlineCheckbox2">Presencial</label>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <content ng-cloak>
    <div class="container lista-eventos">
      <div ng-if="!filtroAtivo">
        <div class="row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-3 row-cols-lg-4">
          <div class="col mb-4 pb-3 listItem" ng-repeat="item in listaEventos | filter: (checkOnline || checkPresencial ? filtrarOnlinePresencial : '') track by $index">
            <div class="card shadow-sm card-click h-100">
              <div class="bannerEvento">
                <img class="card-img-top" ng-if="item.urlImagemInterna != null && item.urlImagemInterna != ''" ng-src="{{item.urlImagemInterna}}" alt="{{item.titulo}}" width="200">
                <img class="card-img-top" ng-if="item.urlImagemInterna == null || item.urlImagemInterna == ''" src="https://even3.azureedge.net/idvisual/logos/png/even3.png" width="200">
              </div>
              <div class="card-body border-top mb-1 pb-0">
                <span class="badge badge-primary mb-1" ng-style="pegarCor(item.cor)">{{item.categoria}}</span>
                
                
                <h5 class="card-title max-3-lines font-weight-bold mb-0 pb-0" ng-class="item.categoria ? '' : 'mt-4'">
                  {{ item.titulo | limitTo: 70 }}{{item.titulo.length > 60 ? '...' : ''}}
                </h5>
              </div>
              <div class="card-footer border-0 mt-0 bg-transparent text-secondary">
                <p class="m-0 card-text">
                  <i class="far fa-calendar-day" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                  {{item.data | date:fullDate}}
                </p>
                <div ng-if="item.eventoOnline"><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> Evento online</p></div>
                <div ng-if="!item.eventoOnline && item.localRealizacao != ' ' "><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> {{item.localRealizacao}} </p></div>
                <div ng-if="!item.eventoOnline && item.localRealizacao == ' ' "><p class="m-0 card-text"><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> {{item.cidade}} </p></div>

                
              </div>
              <a class="stretched-link" target="_blank" href="{{item.urlCliente}}{{item.url}}"></a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      

    </div>

  </content>

</body>

</html>
